{{also|炒鱿鱼}}
==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|s=炒鱿鱼|type=12|lit=to [[fry]] [[squid]]}}

===Etymology===
Originally from {{etyl|yue|cmn}}.

The phrase is metaphorical: “to fry a squid” > “fried squids curl up” > “to roll up the bedclothes and leave” > “to be fired”.

Compare the English phrase {{m|en|get the sack|to get the sack}}.
